body:
**What happened**:
When using `kubectl alpha debug` to create a debug container for a pod that has multiple init containers or ephemeral containers, `kubectl alpha debug` fails with `panic: runtime error: index out of range`.
```
# kubectl alpha debug myapp-pod --image=busybox
panic: runtime error: index out of range [1] with length 1

goroutine 1 [running]:
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/kubectl/pkg/cmd/debug.containerNameToRef(0xc00010a400, 0x18)
        /home/kiyoshim/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/kubectl/pkg/cmd/debug/debug.go:547 +0x299
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/kubectl/pkg/cmd/debug.(*DebugOptions).computeDebugContainerName(0xc0000d8fc0, 0xc00010a400, 0x20, 0x19aa0a0)
        /home/kiyoshim/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/kubectl/pkg/cmd/debug/debug.go:528 +0x4b
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/kubectl/pkg/cmd/debug.(*DebugOptions).generateDebugContainer(0xc0000d8fc0, 0xc00010a400, 0x2)
        /home/kiyoshim/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/kubectl/pkg/cmd/debug/debug.go:389 +0x39
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/kubectl/pkg/cmd/debug.(*DebugOptions).debugByEphemeralContainer(0xc0000d8fc0, 0x1e93060, 0xc0000be010, 0xc00010a400, 0x1ed9a37800000000, 0xc000a079b8, 0xc00062a000, 0xc000650718, 0x4)
        /home/kiyoshim/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/kubectl/pkg/cmd/debug/debug.go:359 +0x386
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/kubectl/pkg/cmd/debug.(*DebugOptions).visitPod(0xc0000d8fc0, 0x1e93060, 0xc0000be010, 0xc00010a400, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x1000100, 0x0)
        /home/kiyoshim/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/kubectl/pkg/cmd/debug/debug.go:343 +0xc5
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/kubectl/pkg/cmd/debug.(*DebugOptions).Run.func1(0xc0007060e0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
        /home/kiyoshim/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/kubectl/pkg/cmd/debug/debug.go:284 +0xd7
```

**What you expected to happen**:
`kubectl alpha debug` should create a debug container in pod `myapp-pod` successfully.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:
The EphemeralContainers feature gate must be enabled by using `--feature-gates=EphemeralContainers=true` flag in your cluster.
```
# cat myapp-pod.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: myapp-pod
spec:
  containers:
  - name: myapp-container
    image: busybox
    command: ['sh', '-c', 'echo The app is running! && sleep 1d']
  initContainers:
  - name: init-container-1
    image: busybox
    command: ['sh', '-c', 'sleep 1d']
  - name: init-container-2
    image: busybox
    command: ['sh', '-c', 'sleep 1d']

# kubectl apply -f myapp-pod.yaml
# kubectl alpha debug myapp-pod --image=busybox
panic: runtime error: index out of range [1] with length 1
```

**Anything else we need to know?**:
